pinyin: ná bù qǐ fàng bù xià
description: The antonym is 「na de qi fang de xia」 (decisive, flexible).

examples.chinese: 为什么他会是一个拿不起放不下的人
examples.translation: Why is he such an indecisive person?

examples.chinese: 如何改变拿不起,放不下的心态
examples.translation: How to change the mindset of being indecisive and unable to let go?

examples.chinese: 好讨厌自己的思维,好讨厌自己拿不起放不下的性格
examples.translation: I hate my way of thinking, I hate my indecisive character.
